/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The road itself is gray, with a white line running down its center, dividing it into two lanes. On the right side of the road, there's a blue sign with white text, although the exact content of the text isn't discernible from the image. The relative positions of the objects suggest a quiet, possibly early morning or late afternoon, with no cars in sight. The image captures the everyday scenery of a typical street in Beijing, with its blend of urban and natural elements.
